text: Kusara kweavo vanotenda (muIslaam) nokuita mabasa akanaka, uye vanorangarira Allah zvakanyanya, uye nekuzvidzivirira mushure mekunge vatadzirwa (vachipindura nenhetembo avo vadetembi vanotaura zvakaipa pamusoro peIslaam). Uye avo vanoita mabasa akashata vachaziva kuti vachapindurwa sei pavachapindurwa (magumo avo achange akaita sei)
